title: List of horror films of the 2020s
table_of_contents: 1 List of horror films of the 2020s

paragraphs.text: This article is a list of horror films originally released in the 2020s. Often there may be considerable overlap particularly between horror and other genres (including, thriller, suspense, slasher, and sci-fi); the list should attempt to document films which are more closely related to horror, even if they bend genres.
